education.area: Computer Science & Engineering | Officer at Competitive Programming Club

highlights: Created a dashboard that displays information about the status of various supercomputer resources.
Wrote and published many features and bug fixes for the OpenOndemand web app, a gateway enabling researchers to utilize the world's most powerful supercomputers.
Utilized Ruby & Ruby on Rails, Linux, Github, Node.js, Bash, Slurm.
Created the MongoDB database, Express.js API and the connecting client code for Monkeytype.com, a site that serves over 100k unique visitors each day.
Immediately reduced costs by 70% and slowed the rate of increasing cloud service costs.
Worked with the owner/lead developer and a more experienced professional to ensure a smooth deployment.
Used Javascript, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, Linux, Git.

projects.name: 3cards
projects.description: A web3 application that allows users to create and share flashcard sets stored on the Arweave, a decentralized blockchain-like storage network.

projects.name: Congol
projects.description: A website that allows users to play Conway's Game of Life with 2 players competing live over the internet.

projects.name: Stem Player Online
projects.description: A web application that enables users to manipulate their music in a way similar to the popular Stem Player device created by Kanye West.
A website where users can store, share, search, discuss, vote on, and manage their ideas. Deployed the site to a live linux server.
projects.name: Ideaspot
mathgenerator
projects.description: Created and maintain an open-source python package that generates a wide variety of math problems. Package has 90 stars on Github and has around 1000 downloads per month.

projects.name: Flag Quiz
projects.description: A flutter app where users can test their knowledge of national flags.

projects.name: BeautifulVHS
projects.description: A website that displays a moving, 3d rendering of old vhs covers.

projects.name: Recolorbot
projects.description: A Reddit bot that colors black and white images using a deep learning image coloring API when a user mentions u/recolorbot on a Reddit image post.

projects.name: Ghlog
projects.description: A command line application to upload journal entries to a Github repository.
